translation.en: [Shawn Mendes] You first get on the stage, and ego comes rushing in.
translation.it: Quando sali sul palco, l'ego ti entra in testa.

translation.en: And it goes, "Don't mess up,
'cause you're the man.
Everyone's saying you're the man, so don't mess up."
translation.it: Lo dicono tutti, quindi non fare casini".

translation.en: So you get to the mic, and your first note is flat. [chuckles] Always.
translation.it: Poi, arrivi al microfono e sbagli la prima nota, sempre.

translation.en: And then about 30 seconds in, you go...
"Oh, yeah, I'm just a guy and I love music."
translation.it: "Sono solo un ragazzo che ama la musica".

translation.en: And your whole body releases.
translation.it: E il tuo corpo si lascia andare.

translation.en: And I just let go and I look around, and I'm just like...
translation.it: Mi lascio andare, mi guardo intorno e penso:

translation.en: "Just do this.
Drop the ego.
Time to surrender."
[automated female voice] Ever since I was about ten years old,
translation.it: Da quando avevo circa dieci anni,

translation.en: I was obsessed with being really good at things.
translation.it: sono ossessionato dal dover eccellere in tutto.

translation.en: That my worth is based on what I do.
translation.it: Dall'idea che il mio valore dipenda da ciò che faccio.

translation.en: And that can lead to a dark place.
translation.it: Ma questo può portarti su un sentiero buio.

translation.en: My voice hit its breaking point at the end of this tour,
translation.it: La mia voce ha raggiunto il punto di rottura alla fine del tour.

translation.en: -and I'm using my phone to talk. -[playing melody]
translation.it: Devo usare il telefono per parlare.

translation.en: Last night reminded me...
I'm not invincible.
♪ Say whoa-oh-oh ♪
Sing!
Louder!
Scream it!
No matter how fast I get, do not stop clapping, all right?
translation.it: Ora andrò più veloce. Non smettete di battere le mani.

translation.en: Here we go! Clap those hands! Clap!
Faster!
-[man] Hey, uh, good one. -[Shawn] Thank you, brother.
Give us a hug.
translation.it: - È stato un gran concerto. - Sì.

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -[man 1] Let's go. Let's motor up.
-We've got an interview outside. -[man 2] I'm not done with it.
translation.it: Ci aspettano fuori. Non ho finito.

translation.en: [woman] You're gonna make a left when you come out
and go through the lights.
-[Shawn] Thank you. Thank you. -[woman 1] Bye!
[woman 2] I love you! I love you!
[man 2] Just keep an eye... I can't see the monitor...
translation.it: Non vedo il monitor della telecamera.

translation.en: So just keep an eye on the recording.
Hey, Cez, Jocelyn's gonna come. I told her to be here for 11:50.
translation.it: Ehi, Cez. Sta arrivando Jocelyn. Le ho detto di venire alle 11:50.

translation.en: [man] All right.
[male interviewer] So, this thing you start doing in your bedroom,
translation.it: Questa cosa che iniziasti a fare in camera tua,

translation.en: making Vines for the love of it...
translation.it: i video su Vine per divertimento…

translation.en: Is it hard to protect that pure thing that started it all?
translation.it: È difficile conservare quella purezza iniziale?

translation.en: [Karen Mendes] Come on, Shawn, let's go! Time to go in!
translation.it: Dai, Shawn, andiamo! Rientra in casa!

translation.en: Get up.
[Shawn] As a kid, when you look at someone and you're like, "This is my dream..."
translation.it: Da bambino, quando racconti a qualcuno il tuo sogno

translation.en: And someone goes, "That's a stupid dream,"
translation.it: e ti dicono che è un sogno stupido,

translation.en: you'd be like, "Oh, yeah, it is a stupid dream."
When I got into school...
Ms. Parker, she was the vocal class teacher,
translation.it: la sig.ra Parker era l'insegnante di canto.

translation.en: and I told her, "I want to be a singer.
translation.it: Le dissi: "Voglio fare il cantante, voglio…

translation.en: I want to be... I want to be an artist." You know?
translation.it: Le dissi: "Voglio fare il cantante, voglio… fare l'artista". Capito?

translation.en: And she had no hesitation to believe me.
translation.it: E lei non esitò a credermi.

translation.en: My parents, my friends...
translation.it: I miei genitori, i miei amici…

translation.en: Nobody looked at me and said, "You're crazy."
translation.it: Nessuno mi ha mai dato del pazzo.

translation.en: Everybody was like, "Go for it."
[Manny] He sounds better all the time now.
With more practice like he's had...
[Karen] Hey!
-We love you, Shawn Mendes! -I'm excited!
[Manny] This is larger than I thought.
[man] Yeah.
-[man] Can he hear it? -No. No, no. Nothing can be heard.
translation.it: - Si sente? - No, non sento niente.

translation.en: [Manny] He may not like being filmed. He's saying hello.
translation.it: Un saluto dalla sicurezza, che non vuole apparire.

translation.en: -Hi. -[Shawn] He can't be filmed.
-[Manny] This ain't going anywhere. -Okay.
Hey, Mom?
translation.it: Ehi, mamma? KAREN, MADRE DI SHAWN

translation.en: What do you say now?
It is nuts.
What, even to go to the bathroom, he has to go with security.
translation.it: La sicurezza lo accompagna persino al bagno.

translation.en: [woman] Oh, my God!
I love you!
[Manny] Did you see that?
-"I love you"? Holy moly. -[Karen laughs]
[women cheering] Hi!
-You're not embarrassed of what? -I'm nervous now.
translation.it: Sei agitato? Ora sono agitato. Prima non lo ero.

translation.en: I wasn't nervous until now.
translation.it: Ora sono agitato. Prima non lo ero.

translation.en: Can we go back there?
[Manny] Hold on. Stay with me.
-[man] Give it up for Shawn Mendes! -[audience cheering]
Do I have anyone from outside of Ontario?
translation.it: C'è qualcuno che viene da fuori dall'Ontario?

translation.en: -Where are you guys from? -Michigan.
Michigan!
Holy...
Crazy.
I think I'd heard A Great Big World, "Say Something" for the first time,
translation.it: Quando ascoltai per la prima volta "Say Something" degli A Great Big World,

translation.en: and I was like, "Wow, that's a really great song."
Googled it...
and one of the first search results was Shawn's cover of the song.
translation.it: e uno dei primi risultati di ricerca era la cover di Shawn.

translation.en: [Gertler] I was taken aback a bit. It was like, "This is really incredible."
translation.it: Rimasi sbalordito. Mi dissi: "È davvero incredibile".

translation.en: Reached out, and we FaceTimed Shawn and his mom.
translation.it: Contattammo Shawn e sua madre tramite FaceTime.

translation.en: Immediately, Shawn just starts grilling us with questions
translation.it: Shawn iniziò subito a tartassarci di domande

translation.en: about how the music business works, why he might need a manager.
translation.it: sull'industria discografica, sul perché gli servisse un manager.

translation.en: I just said to them, I was honest,
"I don't know everything, but I'm going to sit here
translation.it: "Non ho tutte le risposte, ma resterò seduto qui

translation.en: and spend every minute of my time figuring it out with you."
translation.it: e passerò tutto il mio tempo a capirlo insieme a te".

translation.en: [Shawn] I would always say to him, "I need to get a band
translation.it: Gli dicevo sempre: "Mi serve una band. Non renderò bene da solo".

translation.en: 'cause I'll sound bad on my own," and he'd say, "No.
translation.it: "Mi serve una band. Non renderò bene da solo". E lui: "No, amico. Sali sul palco, tu e la chitarra".

translation.en: Just get on the stage, just you and the guitar."
translation.it: E lui: "No, amico. Sali sul palco, tu e la chitarra".

translation.en: Having the confidence
translation.it: Devo tutta la fiducia che ho in me

translation.en: was all based off of those first couple years of performing with just a guitar.
translation.it: Devo tutta la fiducia che ho in me ai primi anni di concerti solo io e la chitarra.

translation.en: I went from a small bedroom in Pickering
to playing in front of a few thousand people in a couple years.
translation.it: a suonare per migliaia di persone nel giro di un paio d'anni.

translation.en: ♪ With somebody who loves me Yeah ♪
It looks so cool.
This is what it's like filming a documentary.
translation.it: È così che si gira un documentario.

translation.en: Here we go.
I'm not ready to give this to Scott.
translation.it: Non sono pronto a darla a Scott.

translation.en: [man] He's not here.
It all stems from when I met him, and he had these cool sunglasses on.
translation.it: Quando l'ho conosciuto, aveva un bel paio di occhiali da sole.

translation.en: He said, "If you had a number one single, I'll give them to you."
translation.it: Mi fa: "Alla prima numero uno, - te li regalo". - Sì.

translation.en: The first thing we did together went number one.
translation.it: Il mio primo singolo con lui arrivò primo.

translation.en: It needs another melody.
Yeah, it's just, like...
♪ You say… ♪
How's that?
[Scott] Got it?
In my room, there's this thing
that has the number of shows that we're on and where we are.
translation.it: con scritto a che concerto siamo e dove.

translation.en: Today it's at number eight, Copenhagen,
and it made me think we're not even close to 100.
translation.it: Siamo ancora lontani dal numero cento.

translation.en: But it also said Cologne, not Copenhagen.
-We're in Cologne. -[Shawn] It said Cologne.
-Actually, it might have said Copenhagen. -[all laughing]
But I want us to always keep in mind that this is very special.
translation.it: Ogni sera, tenete a mente quanto questo sia speciale.

translation.en: I'll say it, I know it'll get annoying,
but it truly is so special. What we get to do is magical.
translation.it: ma è davvero speciale. Noi facciamo una magia.

translation.en: Everyone in there, it's their first time seeing it,
translation.it: Il pubblico lo vede per la prima volta,

translation.en: every single time.
-No matter if it's show one or show 99. -That's right.
translation.it: - Che sia il primo o il 99° concerto. - Esatto.

translation.en: It's their first time seeing it, it's special, so thanks. Let's do it.
translation.it: Per loro, è un'esperienza speciale. Quindi grazie, andiamo.

translation.en: -Beautiful. -Let's do it.
Everybody jump!
[Shawn] I used to look at so many of my idols and be like, "How can you ever be that?
translation.it: Guardando molti dei miei idoli, pensavo: "È impossibile diventare così.

translation.en: They were born legendary."
That's just not the truth.
[Shawn] People are like, "What would you be doing if this didn't happen?"
translation.it: Mi chiedono: "Che lavoro avresti fatto, altrimenti?"

translation.en: I feel puzzled by that question,
translation.it: È una domanda che mi spiazza,

translation.en: because I feel like this is what I was going to do.
translation.it: perché è questo che avrei fatto comunque.

translation.en: I'm in the Q&A yesterday.
This girl goes, "How do I be a songwriter like you?"
translation.it: Una ragazza mi fa: "Come divento una cantautrice come te?"

translation.en: I immediately thought about saying that to my dad,
translation.it: Ho ripensato a quando dissi a papà:

translation.en: "I wanna be a songwriter." He goes, "Can you write songs?"
I said, "I don't know." He goes, "Write one."
translation.it: E io: "Non lo so". E lui: "Provaci".

translation.en: I sat in my room and I played guitar for seven hours.
translation.it: Mi chiusi in camera a suonare per sette ore.

translation.en: My hands bled. I'd play again and get better, and I'd practice.
translation.it: Mi sanguinavano le dita, ma continuavo a provare.

translation.en: And I'm not saying everyone has to be so Olympic athlete about it.
translation.it: Non dico che bisogna essere per forza così ostinati.

translation.en: I said that to her. I was like, "Stop sitting here thinking about it.
translation.it: Così ho detto alla ragazza: "Smettila di starci a pensare.

translation.en: You are a songwriter. Now, go write songs."
translation.it: Sei una cantautrice. Ora vai a scrivere canzoni".

translation.en: -Here we go! -[audience cheering]
You don't hear songs that say,
translation.it: È raro che una canzone dica:

translation.en: "You're just too good to be true. Can't take my eyes off of you."
translation.it: - "Sei troppo bella per non guardarti". - Già.

translation.en: Even, like, those trumpets going... [imitating trumpets]
Like, all that trumpet stuff is really cool, right?
translation.it: Questo uso della tromba è bello, no?

translation.en: Feels, like, so, like, grandiose.
There's something about that I think about when it comes to the next album.
translation.it: È quello che ho in mente per il prossimo album.

translation.en: Something about, like, that, like...
feeling, that, like, all-around, like, overdose of love.
translation.it: questa atmosfera da totale overdose di amore.

translation.en: ♪ Here I sleep in London ♪ ♪ 'Cause I could spend A hundred days in-- ♪
Could you go, "Counting back from 100, so I can fall asleep faster"?
translation.it: Che ne dici di: "Conto alla rovescia per addormentarmi"?

translation.en: -That's cool. -Yeah.
I was feeling like a...
[Scott] Love the echo after "Hello, hello."
[Scott] ♪ Head down on the pillow ♪
"All I have to do."
[man] Yeah.
It sounds better without.
-[man 1] Without? -[man 2] Sounds better.
Again.
Okay, George, punch me on "Close my eyes".
It's pretty cool,
she rents an apartment in West Village, so we're staying there,
translation.it: Ha preso una casa nel West Village. Sto da lei.

translation.en: We wake up in the morning, like, "This is fucked."
translation.it: Ci svegliamo e ci diciamo: "È assurdo".

translation.en: And we have to wake up and both separately get in SUVs to head to the same place.
translation.it: Dobbiamo salire su due SUV diversi per andare nello stesso posto.

translation.en: -[man] Yeah. -It's pretty cool.
I'm like, "I gotta leave at 8:30." She's like, "Me too."
translation.it: Dico: "Esco alle 8:30", e lei: "Anch'io", e io: "Ok".

translation.en: It's almost like living a taste of a normal life
translation.it: È quasi come vivere una vita normale,

translation.en: in the least normal-life way.
translation.it: ma nel modo meno normale che esista.

translation.en: Getting all my clothes on and running to the café for an Americano.
translation.it: Mi vesto, corro al bar a prendere un caffè americano,

translation.en: Then you guys pulled up, and I was like, "Right, we're going to work."
translation.it: poi arrivate voi e dico: "Ok, si va al lavoro".

translation.en: -[man] How you doing? -Good, how are you?
We go this way.
So, when I step this way, what do I do with my arm?
translation.it: Quando mi giro, cosa faccio col braccio?

translation.en: Boom. So this hand, when you step over... You step over here, boom.
translation.it: Con questa mano, quando ti giri, fai così.

translation.en: -You look back... -Love that.
-So-- -Okay, got it.
-You're going to the other side. -No.
-All your weight is here. -Yep.
And then, you know about the outside edge...
translation.it: Poi, quando arriva a bordo palco…

translation.en: This side?
[woman] Yeah, making sure that...
Okay. Super cozy.
-Super cozy. -Yeah.
[kisses] I love you.
-Do you know that? -I know.
[man 1] Thank you, everyone, good to go. Places. Let's start rehearsal, please.
translation.it: Ok, tutti ai posti. Iniziamo le prove, per favore.

translation.en: [man 2] We're ready to roll when you folks are ready.
[Shawn] Camila, she was in Fifth Harmony, and we were both opening.
translation.it: Camila era nelle Fifth Harmony e apriva dei concerti con me.

translation.en: [chuckles] My very first tour ever.
And she was the act after me.
I was first in the lineup,
with the shortest set, and then they went on.
translation.it: facevo pochi brani e poi toccava a loro.

translation.en: Five years ago, man.
[Cabello] He was so...
super hyper-focused on what he was doing.
I never saw him the whole tour.
He was constantly in and out of his bus, playing guitar, writing songs with Geoff.
translation.it: Se ne stava nel suo bus, a suonare e scrivere pezzi con Geoff.

translation.en: I thought he was cute, but I was like,
translation.it: Sì, lo trovavo carino, ma pensavo:

translation.en: "He's... He's doing other stuff, so whatever."
translation.it: "Ha altro per la testa. Lasciamo stare".

translation.en: And then, I guess it must have been about four or five years ago,
translation.it: E poi, credo sia stato quattro o cinque anni fa.

translation.en: we were backstage at this Taylor Swift show.
translation.it: Eravamo nel backstage di Taylor Swift.

translation.en: I went to his dressing room to say hi.
translation.it: Sono andata nel suo camerino a salutarlo.

translation.en: And we, like, started writing this song.
translation.it: E abbiamo iniziato a scrivere questa canzone.

translation.en: And then after that, we, like, spent a lot of time with each other
translation.it: Dopodiché, abbiamo passato molto tempo insieme,

translation.en: because we had the song together and we did a whole Jingle Ball tour together.
translation.it: perché abbiamo fatto quella canzone e il tour di Jingle Ball insieme.

translation.en: And that's really when the fucking saga started.
translation.it: Ed è lì che ha avuto inizio tutta questa cazzo di saga.

translation.en: I really liked him.
I guess he liked me, but...
translation.it: Credo che io gli piacessi, ma…

translation.en: I don't really know. [laughs]
[Shawn] For the past four years,
just being friends and not seeing each other very often
translation.it: nel passaggio dall'essere amici e non vederci spesso

translation.en: to finally being able to be together,
she was always there to look out for me as a human being.
translation.it: lei si è sempre presa cura di me come persona.

translation.en: She's got my back, and I think that's what your partner's for.
translation.it: Mi sta vicino, ed è questo che si fa in coppia.

translation.en: We're in New York, and my song comes on the radio or something,
translation.it: Quando siamo insieme e un mio pezzo passa alla radio,

translation.en: and the fact comes up that it's about her.
translation.it: viene fuori che il pezzo parla di lei.

translation.en: And I'm like, "Yeah, it's about you. Everything's about you.
translation.it: Le dico: "Sì, parla di te. Ogni brano parla di te.

translation.en: They've always been about you."
She goes, "What do you mean?" I'm like, "They're all about you.
translation.it: Mi fa: "Cioè?" E io: "Parlano tutti di te.

translation.en: Like, every song I ever wrote."
translation.it: Ogni pezzo che ho mai scritto".

translation.en: And I'm rhyming off the songs like, "Treat You Better," all these songs.
translation.it: Le elenco tutti i pezzi, da "Treat You Better" agli altri,

translation.en: She's like, "Oh, my God." She literally had no idea.
translation.it: e lei fa: "Mio Dio". Non ne aveva la minima idea.

translation.en: This whole time, I thought she, like, knew.
I don't think I'll be able to write songs that really do it justice,
translation.it: Non credo che potrò mai scrivere un pezzo che le renda giustizia,

translation.en: that can really capture the things and the feelings with her.
translation.it: che colga davvero il sentimento che provo per lei.

translation.en: I think it's like when you see a moon or stars
translation.it: È come quando vedi la luna in un cielo stellato

translation.en: and you try to take a photo of it with your iPhone,
and then you just can't, it just doesn't look good.
translation.it: ma non ci riesci, la foto non viene bene.

translation.en: And you're like, "It's not supposed to be captured." You know?
translation.it: Non è fatta per essere immortalata. Capito?

translation.en: It's just supposed to be for us.
translation.it: È una cosa solo per noi.

translation.en: [Cabello] Want to do it again for fun, stuff like that?
translation.it: - Vogliamo rifarla? - Sì. Ma stavolta così, giusto per scioglierci.

translation.en: Play around just to get loose.
translation.it: Ma stavolta così, giusto per scioglierci.

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah. -Yeah, yeah.
Okay. Good. Let's sing another song.
What's a song for fun? Literally, any song, but ours.
translation.it: Per divertirci. Una qualsiasi, tranne la nostra.

translation.en: ♪ It's not a silly little moment ♪ Fuck, yeah.
Shawn! Shawn, right here for me, man. Shawn!
translation.it: Shawn, da questa parte, per favore.

translation.en: Shawn, right here!
Shawn, one more here.
Oh, my God!
[man] It's insane. That was insane!
That was a really calm red carpet.
translation.it: È stato un tappeto rosso tranquillo.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm serious.
-[man] That was calm? -That was calm, dude.
[Cabello] Wait, my, uh... My shoe! My shoe!
My shoe.
[Shawn] Is there a proper way to do this? I swear, I'm gonna tie a double knot.
translation.it: C'è un modo giusto per farlo? Sì, ma bisogna fare un doppio nodo.

translation.en: [woman] Who's ready?
Can I have water?
Come on, it's time, let's go.
[Shawn] At this moment in time, during the summer of whatever you want to name this summer,
translation.it: In questo momento, per quest'estate, o come vogliamo chiamarla,

translation.en: during "Señorita" and "If I Can't Have You"...
translation.it: durante "Señorita" e "If I Can't Have You"…

translation.en: Camila and I are staying in an apartment in NYC for the very first time alone.
translation.it: io e Camila conviviamo a New York per la prima volta da soli.

translation.en: And making eggs and trying to figure out how to use a Keurig.
translation.it: Cuciniamo uova e cerchiamo di far funzionare la moka.

translation.en: Normal things, you know?
This is really cool, to just be, like, a 21-year-old guy.
translation.it: È una cosa bella per un ragazzo di 21 anni.

translation.en: And getting older...
That's happening for me too.
[man] Give it up for Shawn Mendes!
Camila Cabello, everybody!
[Shawn] I'm nervous.
Yeah, I feel anxious to go home right now.
translation.it: Sì, sono ansioso di tornare a casa.

translation.en: [man] How long has it been?
Three and half months.
It's a long time.
I'm excited to have a couple days off and be with friends and family.
translation.it: Sono felice di passare dei giorni in famiglia e tra amici.

translation.en: Yeah. So excited.
I'm so lucky to have a friend like Brian.
translation.it: Ringrazio di avere un amico come Brian.

translation.en: He loves them anyway.
He works hard at keeping me in the real world.
translation.it: Fa di tutto per tenermi ancorato al mondo reale.

translation.en: If we had our own FIFA cards, you'd probably have--
translation.it: Se avessimo un rating su FIFA, il tuo…

translation.en: -I'd have a high rating. -You'd probably be 76 passing,
translation.it: Sarebbe alto. Tu avresti un 76, io un 82.

translation.en: -I'd be 82. -Not a chance.
-I'd be rated a 93, you'd be rated an 87. -[snorts, laughs]
What's Ronaldo?
Ronaldo? I think Ronaldo's a 94.
-Yeah, I'm a 93. -[both laugh]
Without him, I don't know, I'd probably be, like, pretty crazy.
translation.it: Senza di lui, non lo so, forse impazzirei.

translation.en: Can you match my tone? That's my question.
translation.it: Mi chiedo, sei intonato quanto me?

translation.en: [flatly] ♪ Yeah ♪
♪ Yeah ♪
[Shawn] He just connects me with friends from home.
translation.it: Mi mantiene legato agli amici a casa.

translation.en: I'm probably closer with my friends from home now than ever.
translation.it: Sono legato ai miei amici ora più che mai.

translation.en: -Oh! -They were all supporting me from the first time "Life of the Party" came out,
translation.it: Mi danno il loro sostegno da quando è uscito "Life of the Party"

translation.en: and now we're here together.
I want them to look around and be proud of it
translation.it: Voglio che siano fieri di tutto ciò…

translation.en: and be like, "This is just as much ours as it is his."
translation.it: e che pensino: "È un successo tanto nostro, quanto suo".

translation.en: "Look, guys, we made it.
How beautiful is this?"
All right, bedroom. You did me great. Thanks.
translation.it: Grazie di tutto, camera da letto.

translation.en: I'll see you next time.
Thank God I'm leaving you.
translation.it: Grazie a Dio me ne vado.

translation.en: Double guitar.
Let's go, bro.
Good to see you, man.
-Good to see you, welcome back. -Thank you.
You rock! You rock! You rock!
Welcome.
-It's been unlocked for three months. -[Brian laughs]
Let's go.
Welcome to my cozy house! It smells great in here.
translation.it: Benvenuti a casetta mia. Che buon odore!

translation.en: Okay, everything seems right.
How's your room, Brian? Seems right?
translation.it: La tua stanza, Brian? Tutto ok?

translation.en: [Brian] Checks out.
[Shawn] Everything checks out?
[Brian] Oh, yeah.
An alarm!
Wow, the worst shit. [laughs]
Hasn't been home for so long.
[Shawn] This view is, like, the best view I have ever seen in Toronto.
translation.it: Questa è la miglior vista su Toronto che abbia mai visto.

translation.en: Except for them building this gross thing. What is that?
translation.it: Peccato stiano costruendo quel casermone. Cos'è?

translation.en: Oh, my God, they're building a mall or something.
translation.it: Dio, stanno costruendo un centro commerciale.

translation.en: This is pretty cool, eh? Rogers Centre?
[Brian] You can see it from here. You can see the Rogers Centre from my apartment.
translation.it: - Si vede da casa tua. - Ho la vista sul Rogers Centre.

translation.en: I can see it from my bedroom window when I wake up in the morning.
translation.it: Lo vedo dal letto quando mi sveglio al mattino.

translation.en: That's kind of insane to think about that I'm playing there.
translation.it: È assurdo pensare che suonerò lì.

translation.en: Damn.
[Shawn] Hello, Mom.
-How's it going? -Good, we're just headed down.
translation.it: - Come va? - Bene, stiamo venendo lì.

translation.en: Okay, I'm just trying to... 'Cause I spoke to Amy,
translation.it: Ok, io stavo cercando di… Perché ho parlato con Amy,

translation.en: the coordinator following you, but she wasn't sure
translation.it: la tua coordinatrice, ma non era sicura

translation.en: if you were going to Whitby to get Aaliyah.
translation.it: se passassi tu a prendere Aaliyah.

translation.en: I'm headed to pick her up. I'm 30 minutes from her.
translation.it: Sì, vado io. Mezz'ora e sono da lei.

translation.en: All right, babe. See you soon.
What up!
Hey.
-My daughter's a big fan of yours. -[laughs]
translation.it: Mia figlia è una tua grande fan.

translation.en: You wanna flip that on selfie mode?
Tell your daughter hi.
-Can you say hi? Her name is Berina. -Berina, I love you.
translation.it: La saluti? Si chiama Berina. Berina, ti voglio bene.

translation.en: -Thanks, buddy. -Yeah, man.
Canadian love right there.
Hello.
You had a first day of school today. That's why you're in your outfit.
translation.it: Primo giorno di scuola, oggi. - Sì. - Perciò la divisa.

translation.en: -I like wearing this all the time. -I didn't think about it.
translation.it: Mi vesto sempre così. Sì, non ci avevo pensato.

translation.en: Look at this shit.
Man, this is our... This is our field.
Brian and I fully, 100% climbed up that.
translation.it: Io e Brian ci siamo arrampicati lì, una volta.

translation.en: Swear to God.
He told you?
This is our turf, man. The turf we talked about.
translation.it: Quello è il campetto di cui ti parlavo.

translation.en: -[man chuckles] -Like, this is where we grew up.
translation.it: Questa è la città dove siamo cresciuti.

translation.en: That's why when we talk about Pickering, we're obsessed with it.
Look at this.
-[man] Yo. -Look, I brought Tainy to the turf, bro.
translation.it: - Ehi. - Ho portato Tainy al campetto.

translation.en: -No! What? -[chuckles]
How is it?
It's fucking great, man.
-Man, I should've came. -I know.
Wow, looks amazing.
Dude, it's incredible here right now.
[Aaliyah] When he started singing, he wasn't the greatest.
translation.it: Quando ha iniziato a cantare, non era il massimo.

translation.en: I was like, "Let's see where this goes."
It was just constant noise at my house. So annoying.
translation.it: Faceva solo chiasso, in casa. Che fastidio.

translation.en: Like, it was awful.
I asked him if he wanted to be famous one day,
translation.it: Gli chiesi se volesse diventare famoso,

translation.en: and he, like, shut the whole idea down so fast.
He was like, "No, I don't want to be famous. It seems awful."
translation.it: Mi disse: "Non voglio diventare famoso. Sembra una vitaccia".

translation.en: I don't know if he remembers that, but I remember that like it was yesterday.
translation.it: Non so se si ricorda, ma io lo ricordo come fosse ieri.

translation.en: I remember I asked you when you first started singing
translation.it: Ricordo di averti chiesto, ai tuoi inizi,

translation.en: if you wanted to become famous,
and you, like, were disgusted by the idea.
-I was? -Yeah.
You were like, "No, I would never wanna be famous,
translation.it: Mi dicesti: "Non vorrò mai la fama,

translation.en: like, that lifestyle."
-Probably. -I remember you saying that.
You said it all the time.
'Cause... Obviously, you got good, and you started getting noticed,
translation.it: Poi, sei diventato bravo, hanno iniziato a notarti

translation.en: so I was like, "You're gonna become famous."
You were, like, "I don't wanna be famous." I don't remember that.
translation.it: - Ma tu dicevi: "Non voglio". - Non ricordo.

translation.en: We talked about it all the time in the office.
translation.it: Io sì. Ne parlavamo sempre nello studio.

translation.en: Well, I obviously changed my mind.
I used to...
This door here...
We'd finish school off...
and everyone would come rushing down
and just hang outside on this front thing on a Friday.
translation.it: e passavamo il venerdì pomeriggio lì davanti.

translation.en: Two hundred people hanging out here, trying to figure out the plans for Friday.
translation.it: Duecento ragazzi, tutti qui, a organizzarsi il venerdì sera.

translation.en: -It was so good. -We don't do that.
Welcome home, guys.
-[Aaliyah] I got to do homework. -[both chuckle]
[Shawn] Guys, welcome.
This is my home! [chuckles]
Oh, my God.
So stupid.
The biggest plaque you've ever seen.
I've, like, been in every bedroom, but this is my bedroom. Welcome. [laughs]
translation.it: Ora ti faccio vedere la mia cameretta. Benvenuto.

translation.en: This is the room I recorded all the Vines and stuff in.
translation.it: Questa è la stanza in cui ho registrato tutti i video per Vine.

translation.en: Pretty small in here, right?
This is it, bro.
This pillow is... Fuck.
They smell good.
Whoa. That was actually really overwhelming. [chuckles]
Mom, I feel like I kind of live here again.
translation.it: Mi sembra di vivere di nuovo qui.

translation.en: -[Karen] He only comes here to eat. -Not true.
translation.it: Viene qui solo a mangiare. Non è vero.

translation.en: -Yes, you do. -What is this?
Every time you walk in you're hungry.
Look at this. Look at this sweater.
-It's Camila. -Oh, my God.
-My girlfriend. Do you know about her? -No, I don't, Shawn.
translation.it: È la mia ragazza. Lo sai? No, Shawn.

translation.en: You make more money than all of us,
translation.it: Guadagni più di noi e vieni a mangiare a scrocco?

translation.en: -and you come here to eat for free? -Oh, yeah.
translation.it: Guadagni più di noi e vieni a mangiare a scrocco? Oh, sì.

translation.en: -[in Portuguese] How are you? -[in English] Hey, buddy.
It's crazy. This is the most time
translation.it: È assurdo. Non passavo così tanto tempo a casa

translation.en: I've spent at home in, like, a year, probably,
translation.it: È assurdo. Non passavo così tanto tempo a casa da tipo un anno, forse.

translation.en: in the last three days, right?
translation.it: E ora sto qui per tre giorni.

translation.en: -For sure. -Every time he comes,
translation.it: Già. Ogni volta, cerco di farlo restare.

translation.en: I try to get him to stay.
translation.it: Ogni volta, cerco di farlo restare.

translation.en: And you actually got to relax.
Usually, he comes in and eats, says, "I'm not staying long."
translation.it: Arriva, mangia e fa: "Non mi trattengo molto".

translation.en: We might get him to watch a movie. That's it.
translation.it: Al massimo, si concede un film con noi.

translation.en: Christmas Eve, he stays.
He spends the night to wait for Santa Claus with Aaliyah.
translation.it: Alla vigilia, aspetta Babbo Natale con Aaliyah.

translation.en: -That's right. -Then they get up in the morning,
translation.it: - Sì. - Poi si alzano la mattina

translation.en: and Santa Claus has left all the gifts under the tree.
translation.it: e trovano i regali sotto l'albero.

translation.en: -Isn't that right? -She doesn't drop it.
translation.it: - Non è così? - Non la smette.

translation.en: -No. -Santa Claus is real.
-Yeah. -Right?
-If you believe it. -I believe.
translation.it: - Solo se ci credi. - Io sì.

translation.en: Yeah, that's it.
-You went to the stadium today? -[Manny] I went yesterday.
translation.it: Sei andato allo stadio oggi? No, ieri.

translation.en: -It's big in there. -It's massive.
I don't want to see anything until I walk in tomorrow.
translation.it: Non voglio vedere niente, prima di domani.

translation.en: -I'm gonna be there tomorrow. -What time?
translation.it: - Vengo anch'io, domani. - A che ora?

translation.en: -Probably around noon. -Around noon?
In time for catering, that's why I'll be there.
translation.it: Vengo per il catering, ecco perché.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Good, good, good. Smart guy.
This is, like, something else too.
I wrote this in the green room the other day.
No lyrics.
I want to write a song that's orchestra heaven, massive drums, and... [imitates buzzing drum]
translation.it: C'è questa orchestra celestiale, con la batteria che fa…

translation.en: And then really quiet, my vocal just goes...
translation.it: Poi, cala il silenzio e la mia voce fa…

translation.en: My car is driving itself right now.
translation.it: L'auto si sta guidando da sé.

translation.en: [Shawn] Yesterday we were watching videos of us when we were, like, 16.
translation.it: Ieri, stavamo riguardando dei video di quando avevamo 16 anni.

translation.en: We both got so caught up in it.
We looked at each other and were like, "I don't feel good."
'Cause we were taken right back to that insecure, unsure 15-year-old.
translation.it: Siamo stati catapultati a quell'età di insicurezze e smarrimento.

translation.en: And I just felt like, "Wow, she really understands that feeling."
translation.it: E io ho pensato: "Cavolo, lei capisce questa sensazione".

translation.en: We looked at each other and said, "We feel weird right now, huh?"
translation.it: L'ho guardata e ho detto: "Ti senti strana, vero?"

translation.en: And she's like, "Yeah, we do."
And I'm like, "I'm so happy you know why,
translation.it: E io: "Sono felice che tu mi capisca,

translation.en: 'cause I don't know if I could explain this well to others."
translation.it: perché non saprei spiegarlo ad altre persone".

translation.en: Sounds like your heart.
Feels like my heart, yeah.
Yeah, I went through a phase where I used to write this over and over.
translation.it: C'è stato un periodo in cui ricopiavo sempre le stesse frasi.

translation.en: "I control my brain with my voice."
"I sing with no tension."
"My chest voice is strong and healthy."
translation.it: "La mia voce è forte e sana."

translation.en: This was...
two weeks before we put Rogers Centre on sale, November 24th, 2018.
translation.it: due settimane prima dell'apertura del botteghino per il Rogers Centre.

translation.en: I wrote... "Here we go. I will sell out the Rogers Centre."
translation.it: Ho scritto: "Ci siamo. Riempirò il Rogers Centre".

translation.en: I remember I was in this condo.
translation.it: Ricordo che ero qui a casa.

translation.en: -And on November 28th... 25th, 2018. -You wrote...
-[both] "I sold out the Rogers Centre." -[chuckles]
That's why it worked. I wrote it in my manifestation journal.
translation.it: L'ho scritto nel diario magico e si è avverato.

translation.en: -Yeah, it was persistent. -This is persistency right here.
translation.it: Sì, hai perseverato. Questa è perseveranza.

translation.en: [man] You did that thing where you're...
[Shawn] I think Rogers Centre was always a goal of mine.
translation.it: Ho sempre sognato il Rogers Centre.

translation.en: 'Cause when I started playing music, I'd drive by it every day
translation.it: Quando ho iniziato a suonare, ci passavo davanti ogni giorno

translation.en: and say, "I'm gonna play there one day."
Jesus Christ.
-[man] Whoo! Yeah, man! -[both laugh]
[Shawn] Oh, my God!
What is going on?
I don't even know what to look at.
-Where's the stage? -[man] There.
[chuckles] This is crazy.
It's kind of big.
This is insane!
The stage feels small.
Does the stage look small here?
Does the stage feel small? I know I can't put a new stage in, but...
translation.it: Non è piccolo il palco? So che non si può cambiare, ma…

translation.en: -Brother, look what you did. -[laughs]
I walked on, immediately I was like, "Is the stage small?"
translation.it: Già. Entrando, il palco mi è sembrato piccolo.

translation.en: -Just take it in. -Actually feels like a city here.
translation.it: - Goditelo. - Sembra una città a parte.

translation.en: Look at it.
I'm looking at the Rogers Centre, and for the first time I'm getting nervous.
translation.it: Entro nello stadio per la prima volta e mi sale l'agitazione.

translation.en: On the street, the coffee guy says he's coming to the show.
translation.it: Vado al bar e mi dicono: "Vengo al tuo concerto".

translation.en: My door guy at my condo says, "I'm coming to the show."
translation.it: Il portiere del mio palazzo dice: "Vengo al concerto".

translation.en: This is a real family thing.
translation.it: Sarà come una festa in famiglia.

translation.en: This isn't like...
playing your biggest show of all time. It's more like,
translation.it: il concerto con più affluenza, ma anche…

translation.en: "This is incredible. We're in his hometown.
translation.it: il concerto nella mia città natale.

translation.en: There's so much love surrounded. He's playing a show.
translation.it: Sentirò un calore speciale dal pubblico.

translation.en: It's also in the biggest stadium in the country."
translation.it: In più, sarà nello stadio più grande del Paese.

translation.en: I feel crazy. I've never felt like this.
translation.it: Sto impazzendo. Non mi ero mai sentito così.

translation.en: I feel crazy.
Sing along!
Here we go!
[Shawn] For this whole year and most of your life,
translation.it: È tutto l'anno, se non tutta la vita,

translation.en: it feels like you've been anticipating a show like this.
translation.it: che aspetto un concerto come questo.

translation.en: You're standing in front of a crowd of 50,000 people.
translation.it: Sei davanti a una folla di 50.000 persone

translation.en: And it feels completely surreal.
It's like your feet are floating off the ground.
translation.it: Ti senti come a un metro da terra.

translation.en: It's kind of pure magic from start to finish.
translation.it: È magia pura, dall'inizio alla fine.

translation.en: Everybody all together. Here we go.
I love you so much. Thank you.
[Shawn] I just felt like there was this real sense of love in the room that night.
translation.it: Mi sono sentito inondato di amore lì dentro quella sera.

translation.en: Toronto, I love you so much with all of my heart. Thank you.
translation.it: Toronto, ti amo con tutto il cuore. Grazie.

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you so much for having us.
[man] Manny!
I was so mad. I thought you guys left.
Nothing better than that, Shawn.
-Oh, Shawn, I am so proud of you. -Thank you.
-You know me, I cry a lot. -[laughing]
-[women cheering] -[woman] Shawn!
-Huh? -I have her vocals separate, too,
so we can pull 'em down if we need to.
-It's all over two. -Yeah.
[engineer] The backgrounds right now...
[Shawn] What happens to me when I'm on tour is I get obsessed with chords.
translation.it: Quando sono in tour, mi viene la fissa per gli accordi.

translation.en: I kept playing this.
Something like that.
-Yeah. -To go from the unison to the harmony,
I'd be like, "Can't do it."
-[chuckling] -I had to repeat it.
Most of the time I have to play the piano part into the track.
translation.it: Spesso, risuono la parte al piano prima di cantare.

translation.en: I might come in there with you 'cause it's fun.
translation.it: Mi sa che registro con voi. È divertente.

translation.en: Go again. I'm gonna take a listen for a sec.
'Cause we have this individual line function...
Yeah.
[Shawn] And we're missing the...
-Is anyone doing that note? -♪ Ooh ♪
You are?
-Yeah. -You're just quiet in here.
Where are you? We'll just turn you up a little.
translation.it: Dove sei? Ti alzo il volume.

translation.en: Yeah, we need that.
[Shawn] I've definitely always felt the pressure to make music that's
translation.it: Ho sempre sentito la pressione di fare musica migliore

translation.en: better than what I've done before.
I feel this time around, I'm in the studio...
translation.it: Ma questa volta, entro in sala di incisione…

translation.en: kind of just being like, "Okay, whatever comes, comes."
translation.it: e mi dico: "Ok, quel che viene viene".

translation.en: We recording, George?
[Shawn] You have to not only accept imperfection but embrace imperfection,
translation.it: Le imperfezioni non vanno solo accettate, ma anche cavalcate,

translation.en: because that imperfection in that moment is what turns into magic in the next.
translation.it: perché è l'imperfezione di un attimo a diventare magia nell'attimo successivo.

translation.en: I wonder what else I can do. [sighs]
Maybe I'm doing a little too much on stage.
translation.it: Forse sto facendo troppo sul palco.

translation.en: [Cez Darke] Maybe.
Maybe calm down a bit. You've also added another song.
translation.it: - Capito? - Vacci piano. Hai aggiunto un brano.

translation.en: Two songs.
Two songs, basically.
-And the medley's longer. -Yeah.
translation.it: - E ho allungato il medley. - Sì.

translation.en: So you're working harder.
[raspy voice] London, how you doing?
Beautiful!
I'm so sorry, guys. My voice is cutting out on me so much tonight.
translation.it: Vi chiedo scusa. La voce mi sta abbandonando stasera.

translation.en: I'll need your help as much as I can.
I promise to sing my heart out, but I only got what I got in my voice,
translation.it: Prometto di dare il massimo, ma la voce è quella che ho,

translation.en: so thank you so much.
They're looping.
You tell me when you want to go.
Fucking hell, man. I just...
-What you just did just then... -No, man, I...
translation.it: - Ciò che hai appena fatto… - È che…

translation.en: [Shawn] We're on a 104-show tour, and...
translation.it: È un tour da 104 date e…

translation.en: half of me right now is like, "Make sure you say you're grateful," because I am.
translation.it: una parte di me si sforza di essere grata, perché lo sono.

translation.en: In the biggest way, I'm so grateful.
translation.it: Sono grato nel modo più assoluto.

translation.en: I love these performances. I've never had more fun in my life, but...
translation.it: Adoro stare sul palco. Mi diverte un mondo, ma…

translation.en: I also want to hang with my parents, watch movies.
translation.it: vorrei pure stare con i miei a guardare un film.

translation.en: You're gonna do a tree at my house?
Yeah. I'll do your tree, but nothing else.
translation.it: Ok, ma ti addobbo solo quello.

translation.en: [Shawn] Drive around a suburb, lay on a soccer field...
translation.it: Guidare in periferia, sdraiarmi al campetto e…

translation.en: smoke a joint and stare at the stars with my friends
translation.it: fumare erba, guardare le stelle con gli amici

translation.en: and, like, eat some beef jerky. [laughs]
And, like, really, like, small-town thoughts.
translation.it: Insomma, le cose che si fanno in provincia, capito?

translation.en: You know, those things are like...
translation.it: Insomma, le cose che si fanno in provincia, capito? Sono cose che…

translation.en: I think I miss that a little bit right now.
translation.it: Penso che mi manchino, ora come ora.

translation.en: It's pretty intense all the time.
I really think about that a lot.
If I tell the world that I'm just a normal human,
translation.it: Se mi rivelo per la persona normale che sono,

translation.en: are they going to stop coming to the shows
and listening to the music, and, like,
translation.it: di ascoltare la mia musica? Insomma, tutta questa follia finirà?

translation.en: is all the craziness going to stop?
Then you're like, "Maybe I shouldn't tell them. I should keep the trick up.
translation.it: E poi, penso: "Forse non devo rivelarmi. Meglio recitare la parte.

translation.en: Maybe I should pretend that I'm Superman for a little bit longer."
translation.it: Meglio fingere di essere Superman ancora per un po'".

translation.en: Just played.
Writing a little message on Instagram.
"Feeling overwhelmed by life today.
I'm right here right now, and it's beautiful.
translation.it: Sono qui e ora, ed è bello."

translation.en: And it's so beautiful.
That's all I got for you.
I've been trying to figure it out since it started, you know,
translation.it: Me lo chiedo da quando tutto è iniziato.

translation.en: and I have a billion different ways...
translation.it: Ho un miliardo di risposte diverse.

translation.en: People'll be like, "Why'd this happen to you?" I have a lot of logical answers,
translation.it: Perché è successo proprio a me? Ci sono tante spiegazioni logiche,

translation.en: but none of them are satisfying, you know?
translation.it: ma nessuna è soddisfacente, mi spiego?

translation.en: I'm constantly warming up,
and I'm constantly checking my voice out of fear of the fact that...
translation.it: Controllo la voce di continuo per paura che…

translation.en: one day I'm going to go to sing and it's going to just not come out.
translation.it: un giorno, davanti al microfono, la voce non mi esca.

translation.en: [Vetro] Open the back of your throat, take a deep breath.
translation.it: Apri la gola e fai un bel respiro.

translation.en: [Vetro] Really loose and open.
[Shawn] What are they doing?
[man] They're running 'cause they see other people running.
translation.it: Corrono, perché vedono altra gente correre.

translation.en: Dude, the show's gonna be nuts.
They're screaming.
I wonder if the band's out there.
translation.it: Chissà se la band è lì.

translation.en: Maybe it's 'cause I just posted the Instagram of the sunset.
translation.it: Forse è per il tramonto che ho postato su Instagram.

translation.en: Doesn't mean that I'm down there.
translation.it: Non vuol dire che sia laggiù.

translation.en: -Hi. -This experience has been so good.
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
-I can't speak. -It's okay.
It's so nice to meet you.
Yeah.
You make me feel connected to you and connected to people around me,
translation.it: …mi fa sentire connessa a te e alle persone che ho intorno.

translation.en: and I'm just so thankful, and I...
-Oh, my God. -[laughs]
Should we take a photo?
[Shawn] When you're pulling up to a hotel in a country you've never been to,
translation.it: Quando arrivi in un hotel in un paese straniero e ci sono mille persone fuori ad aspettarti…

translation.en: and there's 1,000 people outside waiting for you...
translation.it: e ci sono mille persone fuori ad aspettarti…

translation.en: no matter how many times you go through that, it feels...
translation.it: non importa quante volte l'hai già vissuto, sembra…

translation.en: like a dream.
I don't know if that's ever going to feel normal.
translation.it: Non so se mi sembrerà mai normale.

translation.en: I don't know if that's supposed to feel normal.
I love you so much, thank you!
Thank you so much!
Thank you, Shawn! I love you!
What's up, guys?
We're, uh... We're in Brazil on the last leg of the tour.
translation.it: Siamo in Brasile per l'ultima frazione del tour.

translation.en: I woke up feeling...
[clears throat] ...pretty sick today.
The day before I'm gonna play two stadiums in São Paulo.
translation.it: Da domani, ho due concerti di fila a San Paolo.

translation.en: But you know what? It's okay because...
I watched some Kobe Bryant YouTube videos and I feel great.
translation.it: ho guardato dei video di Kobe Bryant su YouTube.

translation.en: -'Cause I had swelling on my right cord. -Yeah, that's swollen.
translation.it: - Avevo un gonfiore sulla corda destra. - Sì, tutto qui.

translation.en: Just wanna check. I have volume if I wanna bring it back.
translation.it: - Volevo capire. - Sì. Posso alzare il volume, se voglio.

translation.en: -Okay, you'll just-- -But I just am choosing not to. Yeah.
translation.it: - Ok, ma non… - Ma scelgo di non farlo. Sì.

translation.en: Yeah.
Thank you so much.
[Vetro] Hey, how's it going?
It's going. It's going.
Just listen to this. This is...
I don't know. It makes me very nervous.
translation.it: Non lo so. Mi rende molto nervoso.

translation.en: What time is it there right now?
translation.it: Che ore sono lì da te?

translation.en: And what time is the show?
translation.it: E a che ora è il concerto?

translation.en: I don't think it's a good idea. That's my feeling.
translation.it: Non è una buona idea, per come la vedo io.

translation.en: I want to bring you to Cez,
just so you can say to him, based off of...
translation.it: così puoi dirgli, in base a come…

translation.en: You're saying, based off of how my voice sounds--
translation.it: In base a come hai sentito la mia voce…

translation.en: Based off of that, you shouldn't even be talking.
translation.it: In base a quello, non dovresti neanche parlare.

translation.en: I'm nervous that you'll hurt yourself, and then...
translation.it: Temo che tu possa peggiorare e poi…

translation.en: Can you hear me?
Yeah.
Hey.
Yeah, so we FaceTimed Nasseri in while we were in with the other doc.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto una videochiamata di gruppo con Nasseri e l'altro dottore.

translation.en: So he was there looking at all the videos, all the scopes.
translation.it: È stato lì a vedere tutti i video, le analisi.

translation.en: Everything was, like, through him.
Yeah, I completely trust what you're saying, and agree.
translation.it: Sì, mi fido di quello che dici e sono d'accordo.

translation.en: The truth is in the singing.
Yeah, a hundred percent. [chuckles]
It's there or it's not. Yeah, totally.
translation.it: O c'è, o non c'è. Sì, certo.

translation.en: Okay, if you're saying it's detrimental to warm up right now,
translation.it: Ok, se dici che è dannoso riscaldare la voce ora,

translation.en: then let's not do that.
All good. Thanks, Eric.
All right. Bye, dude.
Just so you know, I've made it very aware that we have 11 more shows after this.
translation.it: Sappi che ho rimarcato il fatto che mancano ancora 11 concerti.

translation.en: If we're in any way pushing through this show to get this show done,
translation.it: Se ti mettiamo sotto sforzo con il concerto di stasera,

translation.en: it'll be to the detriment of those.
-We'll have to start thinking about-- -The show scenario. Yeah.
translation.it: Iniziamo a ragionare… - Sul concerto di stasera, sì. - Sì.

translation.en: Dr. Nasseri, it's Cez here.
I'm going to merge a call with Eric,
and you've got me and Shawn here.
translation.it: Qui, ci siamo io e Shawn.

translation.en: [Vetro] So, Shawn, any improvement yet?
-Five hours to show time, Cez? -Yeah, we're 30 minutes to doors.
translation.it: Cinque ore al concerto, Cez? Sì. Tra mezz'ora, aprono i cancelli.

translation.en: -Thirty minutes to doors? Why so early? -'Cause it's a stadium.
translation.it: Tra mezz'ora? Perché così presto? Perché è uno stadio.

translation.en: Right.
[Nasseri] I was just gonna say, we've seen people who have said,
translation.it: Ci sono stati in passato cantanti che hanno detto:

translation.en: "I'm just going to muscle through it",
and they completely hemorrhaged, and then they needed surgery.
translation.it: ma poi hanno avuto un'emorragia e sono dovuti andare sotto i ferri.

translation.en: I mean, I know it's a really overwhelming thing to cancel, but--
translation.it: So quanto è doloroso annullare un concerto, ma…

translation.en: [Vetro] I'm gonna step in now and tell you
translation.it: Scusa se ti interrompo, ma voglio dire

translation.en: you have really no voice, we have 11 shows to go.
translation.it: che se non hai voce e ti restano 11 concerti da fare,

translation.en: For an outside stadium,
you're gonna hurt yourself for the next 11.
translation.it: ti farai del male per i prossimi 11.

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Vetro] What do you think, Shawn?
I don't know. I'm not in a good place to make any decisions.
translation.it: Non lo so. Non sono in grado di prendere decisioni.

translation.en: [Darke] He's overwhelmed.
And just to be clear, both of you are saying
translation.it: Giusto per essere chiari, state dicendo entrambi

translation.en: we should cancel the show, right?
-[Vetro] We're unanimous on that. -[Darke] Okay.
Well, we'll get into it this side, and, um...
translation.it: Beh, ora ne discutiamo tra di noi e…

translation.en: Yeah, we'll let you know on the final decision, and then we'll update you.
translation.it: vi facciamo sapere cosa decidiamo e vi aggiorniamo.

translation.en: -[Vetro] Okay. -All right. Thanks, dudes.
Take care.
See you in a bit, all right?
[in Portuguese] Canceled!
"It breaks my heart to do this,
but my doctors told me I cannot perform tonight,
translation.it: ma oggi il medico mi vieta di cantare.

translation.en: or it would risk long-term damage to my voice.
translation.it: Rischierei un danno prolungato alla voce.

translation.en: I love you all, and I apologize from the bottom of my heart.
translation.it: Vi voglio bene e mi scuso con tutto il cuore.

translation.en: I wish I could be there on stage tonight.
I'll make it up to you the next time I'm there."
-[sighs, sniffles] -[Karen] Aw, babe, I'm sorry.
It was a great show last night.
They got to see you there, babe. It wasn't like...
translation.it: L'hanno visto, il concerto. Pensa che…

translation.en: you haven't been there. They've seen you.
translation.it: almeno uno l'hai fatto lì. Ti hanno visto, ti hanno sentito.

translation.en: They've experienced it.
translation.it: Ti hanno visto, ti hanno sentito.

translation.en: It wasn't like you've never been there.
translation.it: Non è che tu non sia mai stato lì.

translation.en: You told me you were sick. You had a bad voice,
translation.it: Mi avevi detto di avere problemi di voce,

translation.en: but you never told me it was that serious.
translation.it: ma non che fossero così gravi.

translation.en: It's fine. You're fine. It's not the end of the world, babe.
translation.it: Tranquillo. Non è la fine del mondo, amore.

translation.en: Take a breath.
[whispering] Yeah. You can't help it.
Love you.
You too, babe. I love you more.
You're good. You've got it.
You've got this, babe.
You know what, the fans are gonna understand.
translation.it: Sai una cosa? I fan capiranno.

translation.en: Yeah, said you were on vocal rest. I didn't realize it was that serious.
translation.it: Non puoi parlare? Non pensavo fosse così grave.

translation.en: [Shawn] It's so hard in that moment to be like, "What can you do?"
translation.it: È dura in quei momenti dirsi: "Beh, che puoi farci?"

translation.en: because there's 40,000 people outside.
translation.it: Perché ci sono 40.000 persone là fuori.

translation.en: And you just feel...
the deepest pit in your stomach.
Wow, it changes the mood real fast.
translation.it: Wow, ci si è affossato l'umore.

translation.en: [Shawn] When we got to the hotel
and I was up in my room, I was so upset with the situation,
translation.it: ero in camera mia, avvilito per la situazione,

translation.en: and then I heard chanting from outside.
translation.it: quando ho sentito un coro dalla strada.

translation.en: I opened up my window, and there was 2,000 people in the streets chanting.
translation.it: Ho aperto la finestra e c'erano 2.000 persone che urlavano.

translation.en: And that is, like, beautiful.
Right then, I was like, "I can't even...
I can't even believe how good people are."
Just a really beautiful thing.
[automated female voice] I was upset for a while.
translation.it: Sono stato triste per un po'.

translation.en: I sat there in the stadium knowing I was the reason it was all falling apart.
translation.it: Seduto nello stadio, sapevo di essere la causa per cui tutto si sgretolava.

translation.en: The hardest part is feeling like I let them down.
translation.it: La cosa più difficile è sentire di averli delusi.

translation.en: These next 10 years are when everything I do is going full speed.
translation.it: Nei prossimi dieci anni, dovrò fare tutto alla massima velocità.

translation.en: It's like an athlete in their prime.
translation.it: Sono come un atleta nel fiore degli anni.

translation.en: I have to keep going.
[Shawn] The heaviness of the tour
translation.it: ULTIMA SESSIONE DI INCISIONE DI "WONDER" Le difficoltà del tour, in vari modi,

translation.en: made me want to flip things around and become more positive, you know?
translation.it: mi hanno fatto cambiare punto di vista e diventare più ottimista.

translation.en: And I'm writing about anxiety more as...
translation.it: Nelle canzoni che sto scrivendo, parlo dell'ansia più come…

translation.en: a companion I have to live with
and less of an enemy that I'm trying to resist.
translation.it: che come una nemica da contrastare.

translation.en: Okay, can we just double that, then?
-Double that, I think it's cool. -Cool.
I'm really excited to sing these songs on tour.
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di cantarle in tour.

translation.en: All this stuff is so playable, in the best way.
translation.it: Sono canzoni perfette per un concerto, davvero.

translation.en: I want another Juno to come in...
behind it there, like...
And then another third one to come in there,
translation.it: E poi, ne entra un terzo,

translation.en: like, kind of, a little rise.
When you start an album, you don't really know what to expect.
translation.it: Quando inizi un album, non sai cosa aspettarti.

translation.en: So you just have to dive in and see what happens.
translation.it: Devi solo lanciarti e vedere che succede.

translation.en: Some sort of little thing in the back there.
-You felt that there? -Little pause? Yeah.
Hear it now.
How are the horns sounding right now?
Is this how we always assembled?
-It's our thing. -Okay, cool.
[man 1] Good times.
It's our last show.
-It's our last show. -[man 2] And it's sold out.
translation.it: - Ultimo concerto. - Ed è tutto esaurito.

translation.en: Sold out, baby.
Why do you look so cool?
-[Aaliyah] How are you? -Fine!
-Hey! -How you feeling?
-How's it going? -Mom on FaceTime?
-She is. -Hi, Mom!
I'll flip it around.
[Shawn] A hundred and five shows...
The last year of my life has been this tour, and...
translation.it: Ho passato un anno in tour e…

translation.en: it's bittersweet.
It's more sweet than bitter, to be honest.
translation.it: Più dolce che amaro, a essere onesto.

translation.en: This makes me so happy, when I come into the venue,
translation.it: Questo mi rende felice, quando arrivo al palazzetto

translation.en: and it's been weeks, and all of a sudden,
translation.it: dopo settimane in giro e, di colpo,

translation.en: the "Manny" thing pops up, and I'm like, "He's coming to town."
translation.it: compare il nome "Manny" e dico: "Sta arrivando in città".

translation.en: ♪ Ooh, a storm is threatening ♪
♪ My very life today ♪
♪ If I don't get some shelter ♪
♪ Ooh, yeah, I'm gonna fade away ♪
♪ War, children ♪
♪ It's just a shot away ♪
-Hey, bro. -Hey, brother.
[Shawn] At the end of this tour, I'm realizing
translation.it: Con la fine del tour, sto capendo

translation.en: this is something I want to do for the rest of my life.
translation.it: che voglio fare questo per tutta la vita.

translation.en: How do you get to the end of a very, very intense year...
translation.it: Com'è possibile arrivare alla fine di un anno così faticoso…

translation.en: and want to do it all over again?
At the end of this tour, I wish I had some profound thing to say about all this, but...
translation.it: Vorrei avere una riflessione profonda da dire su tutto questo, ma…

translation.en: you know what the truth is?
You walk up on the stage and you look around and you think...
translation.it: Quando sali sul palco, ti guardi intorno e ti dici…

translation.en: "I'm just a guy who really loves music.
translation.it: "Sei un ragazzo che ama la musica.

translation.en: Time to let go."
New York!
[Shawn] Until next time. We love you. Thank you so much for having us.
translation.it: Alla prossima. Vi amiamo. Grazie di essere venuti.

translation.en: Let me record that.
♪ The only thing that's on my mind ♪ ♪ Been dreaming that you feel it too ♪
